meanings.definition: To equip with a conveyor system.
meanings.sent1: The factory conveyorized the production line for efficiency.
meanings.sent2: They conveyorized the warehouse to streamline the shipping process.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if we can conveyorize our morning routine to get ready faster!
meanings.sent4: Her mind conveyorized thoughts like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The ants conveyorized the food back to their nest with impressive teamwork.

meanings.definition: Operating by means of a conveyor system.
meanings.sent1: The conveyorized assembly line increased productivity.
meanings.sent2: The conveyorized packaging system ensured items were moved smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The airport became a conveyorized wonderland of luggage on the move.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed through his mind like a conveyorized process.
meanings.sent5: The conveyorized sushi belt made choosing dishes a fun experience.
